item.title: OpenSSH changing hostnames based on location
item.description: How to change SSH hostnames based on guessed location
item.dc:creator: Jason Antman

item.title: Logging OpenSSH SFTP Transactions
item.description: I just came across a really handy post on David Busby‘s blog: Enable logging in the SFTP subsystem - Oneiroi. From OpenSSH 4.4 on, you can pass arguments to Subsystem calls, and the sftp subsystem supports logging to an aribtrary syslog facility and priority. Simply adding a line like …
item.dc:creator: admin

item.title: HP Prolaint iLO SSH Problems
item.description: There’s a known issue with the SSH implementation in the iLO firmware for HP Proliant servers (specifically G2 and G3) and OpenSSH 5.1p1. There was a thread on the OpenSSH developers list that referenced this problem and suggested a solution, but it doesn’t seem to be a …
item.dc:creator: admin
